title: OneLogin Names Justin Calmus Chief Security Officer
text:
Former VP of Hacker Success, Zenefits CIO/CSO Brings Deep Enterprise Expertise to Meet IT Security and Compliance Needs for OneLogin’s 2,000+ Customers
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- OneLogin , the industry leader in Unified Access Management, today announced the appointment of Justin Calmus as Chief Security Officer. With deep experience across enterprise information security in CIO and CSO roles, Calmus will architect and lead OneLogin’s risk management, security and compliance efforts.
For enterprises of any size, ensuring security, availability, confidentiality and privacy has never been more critical or more complex. As CSO of OneLogin, Justin will drive security and compliance requirements for some of the most demanding computing environments for companies such as AAA, Airbus, Citizen, Tesco and over 2,000 others.
Calmus brings extensive experience as an enterprise information security leader. Before joining OneLogin, Calmus served as VP of Hacker Success at HackerOne, the leading bug bounty platform, where he was responsible for representing and cultivating HackerOne’s community of more than 100,000 hackers.
Prior to his tenure there, he served as CIO and CSO at Zenefits, was director of enterprise security at Salesforce, and manager of security engineering at LinkedIn.
“Security is paramount as digital transformation empowers businesses with enhanced efficiency and business agility,” said OneLogin CEO Brad Brooks. “Justin has a unique blend of experience and expertise, and I am delighted to have him leading our efforts.”
“OneLogin is at an exciting stage of its growth from both a business and a technology perspective as it pioneers the new Unified Access Management category,” said Justin Calmus. “I’m thrilled to be joining the executive team to lead security and compliance efforts as the company moves its vision forward.”
OneLogin’s Unified Access Management Platform featuring OneLogin Access is purpose-built for hybrid customer environments. For the first time, OneLogin Access allows companies of any size to manage access for on-premise and cloud-based applications with a single Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS) solution.
For more information about Justin’s appointment and role, please read OneLogin’s blog post here .
About OneLogin, Inc.
OneLogin is the leader in Unified Access Management, Enabling Organizations to Access the World™. OneLogin makes it simpler and safer for organizations to access the apps and data they need anytime, everywhere. The OneLogin Unified Access Management Platform secures millions of identities for thousands of companies around the globe, spans both cloud and on-prem environments, and unifies all users, devices, and applications to transform enterprises. We are headquartered in San Francisco, California. For more information, visit www.onelogin.com , Blog , Facebook , Twitter , or LinkedIn .
